title: About G-Source
content: G-Source is an platform made for the Gorilla Tag fan game Community. Here you can find Dev Hubs and search globablaly for scripts in the G-Source Developers. You can search for scripts and give them an Up or Down Vote. You can find many dev hubs in here that you can rate aswell. To become an GS Contributor you need to add the G-Source Bot to your server (no risky perms needed just data reading) and begin the set up process. Learn more about that from the bot using /SetUp.
